actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to require that the United States Government prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements utilizing the accrual method of accounting, and for other purposes.
short_title: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1981

summary.text: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1981 - Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements for the United States based on accrual accounting procedures.

titles.title: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1981
A bill to require that the United States Government prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements utilizing the accrual method of accounting, and for other purposes.
